#SpatioTemporalPointPatternAnalysis

A spatio-temporal point process is a random collection of points, where each point represents the time and location of an event.



## Install/Launch R


::: {.cell}

:::

forest fire or something


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(sf, raster, spatstat, sparr, tmap, tidyverse)
```
:::


## Import the data

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
kbb <- st_read(dsn = "data/rawdata", layer = "Kepulauan_Bangka_Belitung")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `Kepulauan_Bangka_Belitung' from data source 
  `C:\Users\pwnyt\Documents\GitHub\415\ICE\ex4\data\rawdata' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 298 features and 27 fields
Geometry type: POLYGON
Dimension:     XYZ
Bounding box:  xmin: 105.1085 ymin: -3.116593 xmax: 106.8488 ymax: -1.501603
z_range:       zmin: 0 zmax: 0
Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
kbb_sf <- st_read(dsn = "data/rawdata", layer = "Kepulauan_Bangka_Belitung") %>%
  st_union() %>%
  st_zm(drop = TRUE, what = "ZM") %>%
  st_transform(crs = 32748)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `Kepulauan_Bangka_Belitung' from data source 
  `C:\Users\pwnyt\Documents\GitHub\415\ICE\ex4\data\rawdata' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 298 features and 27 fields
Geometry type: POLYGON
Dimension:     XYZ
Bounding box:  xmin: 105.1085 ymin: -3.116593 xmax: 106.8488 ymax: -1.501603
z_range:       zmin: 0 zmax: 0
Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
st_as_s2(): dropping Z and/or M coordinate
```


:::
:::



convert kbb to owin object

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
kbb_owin <- as.owin(kbb_sf)
kbb_owin
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
window: polygonal boundary
enclosing rectangle: [512066.8, 705559.4] x [9655398, 9834006] units
```


:::
:::

check owin

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
class(kbb_owin)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "owin"
```


:::
:::


Forest Fire data

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
fire_sf <- read.csv("data/rawdata/forestfires.csv") %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c("longitude", "latitude"), crs = 4326) %>%
  st_transform(crs = 32748)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
fire_sf <- fire_sf %>%
  mutate(DayOfYear = yday(acq_date)) %>%
  mutate(Month_num = month(acq_date)) %>%
  mutate(Month_fac = month(acq_date, label = TRUE, abbr = FALSE))
```
:::


Plotting map showing the distribution of fire points

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tm_shape(kbb_sf) + tm_polygons() + tm_shape(fire_sf) + tm_dots()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](ice4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Plotting map showing the distribution of fire points by month

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tm_shape(kbb_sf) + tm_polygons() + tm_shape(fire_sf) + tm_dots(size = 0.1) + tm_facets(by = "Month_fac", free.coords = FALSE, drop.units = TRUE) 
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](ice4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


##Compute STKDE
###By Month

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
fire_month <- fire_sf %>%
  select(Month_num)
```
:::



make ppp object

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
fire_month_ppp <- as.ppp(fire_month)
fire_month_ppp
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Marked planar point pattern: 741 points
marks are numeric, of storage type  'double'
window: rectangle = [521564.1, 695791] x [9658137, 9828767] units
```


:::
:::



check ppp object

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
summary(fire_month_ppp)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Marked planar point pattern:  741 points
Average intensity 2.49258e-08 points per square unit

Coordinates are given to 10 decimal places

marks are numeric, of type 'double'
Summary:
   Min. 1st Qu.  Median    Mean 3rd Qu.    Max. 
  1.000   8.000   9.000   8.579  10.000  12.000 

Window: rectangle = [521564.1, 695791] x [9658137, 9828767] units
                    (174200 x 170600 units)
Window area = 29728200000 square units
```


:::
:::


check for duplicated points

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
any(duplicated(fire_month_ppp))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] FALSE
```


:::
:::


combine ppp w owin

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
fire_month_owin <- fire_month_ppp[kbb_owin]
summary(fire_month_owin)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Marked planar point pattern:  741 points
Average intensity 6.424519e-08 points per square unit

Coordinates are given to 10 decimal places

marks are numeric, of type 'double'
Summary:
   Min. 1st Qu.  Median    Mean 3rd Qu.    Max. 
  1.000   8.000   9.000   8.579  10.000  12.000 

Window: polygonal boundary
2 separate polygons (no holes)
           vertices        area relative.area
polygon 1     47493 11533600000      1.00e+00
polygon 2       256      306427      2.66e-05
enclosing rectangle: [512066.8, 705559.4] x [9655398, 9834006] units
                     (193500 x 178600 units)
Window area = 11533900000 square units
Fraction of frame area: 0.334
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
st_kde <- spattemp.density(fire_month_owin)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Calculating trivariate smooth...Done.
Edge-correcting...Done.
Conditioning on time...Done.
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
summary(st_kde)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Spatiotemporal Kernel Density Estimate

Bandwidths
  h = 15102.47 (spatial)
  lambda = 0.0304 (temporal)

No. of observations
  741 

Spatial bound
  Type: polygonal
  2D enclosure: [512066.8, 705559.4] x [9655398, 9834006]

Temporal bound
  [1, 12]

Evaluation
  128 x 128 x 12 trivariate lattice
  Density range: [1.233458e-27, 8.202976e-10]
```


:::
:::


plotting STKDE by last 6 months 

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tims <- c(7,8,9,10,11,12)
par(mfcol = c(2,3))
for(i in tims){
  plot(st_kde, i,
       override.par = FALSE,
       fix.range = TRUE,
       main = paste("KDE at month", i))
}
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](ice4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-17-1.png){width=1152}
:::
:::

###By Day
create ppp object

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
fire_yday_ppp <- fire_sf %>%
  select(DayOfYear) %>%
  as.ppp()
```
:::

combine ppp and owin

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
fire_yday_owin <- fire_yday_ppp[kbb_owin]
summary(fire_yday_owin)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Marked planar point pattern:  741 points
Average intensity 6.424519e-08 points per square unit

Coordinates are given to 10 decimal places

marks are numeric, of type 'double'

   Min. 1st Qu.  Median    Mean 3rd Qu.    Max. 
   10.0   213.0   258.0   245.9   287.0   352.0

2 separate polygons (no holes)
           vertices        area relative.area
polygon 1     47493 11533600000      1.00e+00
polygon 2       256      306427      2.66e-05
enclosing rectangle: [512066.8, 705559.4] x [9655398, 9834006] units
                     (193500 x 178600 units)
Window area = 11533900000 square units
Fraction of frame area: 0.334
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
kde_yday <- spattemp.density(fire_yday_owin)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Calculating trivariate smooth...Done.
Edge-correcting...Done.
Conditioning on time...Done.
```

summary(kde_yday)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

  h = 15102.47 (spatial)
  lambda = 6.3198 (temporal)

No. of observations
